page.title: ServerlessDays Cardiff - Julian Wood
page.description: Principal Developer Advocate for AWS Serverless.

speaker.name: Julian Wood
speaker.title: Principal Developer Advocate for AWS Serverless
speaker.bio: Julian is a Principal Developer Advocate for AWS Serverless. He works within the serverless product teams at AWS to help people use and love serverless more. He also acts as the internal voice of developers and builders to help make AWS serverless the best place to run applications

talk.title: What's new in AWS Lambda
talk.abstract: Last year AWS Lambda celebrated it's 10th birthday. This year it has continued to scale (handling over 1.7 trillion invocations during Prime Day 2025) and innovate. In this talk, Julian will demo all of the latest AWS Lambda features that improve developer experience, including features such as remote debugging.
